alert.note: Alert for Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 5:20AM EDT until March 31 at 5:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 420 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles northeast of Panama City Beach, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lynn Haven around 430 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Nixon, Bayhead, Southport, Singer Road, Recota Beach, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Gainer Spring, Bennett and Youngstown. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
